mapper.select: SELECT article.articleId,typeName, articleTitle,articleText, articlePicUrl,articleUpNumber, articleDownNumber,articleTime, (SELECT AVG(articleScore) From article,articlescore Where article.articleId=#{articleId} and articlescore.articleId=article.articleId) articleScore,sourceName, keywordName,keywordWeight sourceType,stratDate,clickNumber FROM article,type,source,keyword,keywordweight WHERE article.articleId=#{articleId} AND article.typeId=type.typeId AND article.sourceId=source.sourceId AND article.articleId=keywordweight.articleId AND keywordweight.keywordId=keyword.keywordId

SELECT article.articleId FROM article,articlescore WHERE article.typeId=(SELECT typeId FROM type WHERE typeName=#{typeName}) AND article.articleId=articleScore.articleId GROUP BY article.articleId ORDER BY avg(articleScore) DESC LIMIT 0,${topNum}

SELECT article.articleId,typeName, articleTitle,articleText, articlePicUrl,articleUpNumber, articleDownNumber,articleTime, sourceName, sourceType,stratDate, clickNumber,historyRecordTime FROM historyRecord,article,type,source,collection WHERE historyRecord.userId=#{userId} AND historyRecord.articleId=article.articleId AND article.typeId=type.typeId AND article.sourceId=source.sourceId ORDER BY historyRecordTime DESC

SELECT article.articleId,typeName, articleTitle,articleText, articlePicUrl,articleUpNumber, articleDownNumber,articleTime, sourceName, sourceType,stratDate, clickNumber,collectTime FROM collection,article,type,source WHERE collection.userId=#{userId} AND collection.articleId=article.articleId AND article.typeId=type.typeId AND article.sourceId=source.sourceId ORDER BY collectTime DESC
